common_cards.name: Hanta Sero
common_cards.description: The 'Tape Hero: Cellophane', Sero uses tape from his elbows to immobilize enemies and swing across buildings.

common_cards.name: Yuga Aoyama
common_cards.description: The 'Shining Hero: Can't Stop Twinkling', Aoyama uses a naval laser to dazzle and defeat foes with elegance.

common_cards.name: Minoru Mineta
common_cards.description: The 'Fresh-Picked Hero: Grape Juice', Mineta uses sticky balls for immobilization, though he's often perverted comic relief.

common_cards.name: Nomu
common_cards.description: Engineered bioweapon with multiple quirks, Nomu serves as a terrifying enforcer for the League of Villains.

uncommon_cards.name: Denki Kaminari
uncommon_cards.description: The 'Stun Gun Hero: Chargebolt', Kaminari wields electricity to paralyze enemies, though overuse will fry his brain.

uncommon_cards.name: Kyoka Jiro
uncommon_cards.description: The 'Hearing Hero: Earphone Jack', Jiro uses sound-based attacks and can detect vibrations for stealth operations.

uncommon_cards.name: Momo Yaoyorozu
uncommon_cards.description: The 'Creation Hero: Creati', Momo can create any non-living object from her body using her Quirk, Creation and the lipids in her body.

uncommon_cards.name: Fumikage Tokoyami
uncommon_cards.description: The 'Jet-Black Hero: Tsukuyomi', Tokoyami controls a sentient shadow beast called 'Dark Shadow' for devastating attacks.

rare_cards.name: Tsuyu Asui
rare_cards.description: The 'Rainy Season Hero: Froppy', Asui's frog-like abilities give her versatility and mobility in combat, but please call her 'Tsu'.

rare_cards.name: Eijiro Kirishima
rare_cards.description: The 'Sturdy Hero: Red Riot', Kirishima hardens his body to withstand powerful attacks and protect allies.

rare_cards.name: Shota Aizawa
rare_cards.description: The 'Erasure Hero: Eraser Head', Aizawa nullifies opponents' quirks with his eyes and immobilizes threats with his scarf.

epic_cards.name: Tenya Iida
epic_cards.description: The 'Turbo Hero: Ingenium', Iida uses Engine-powered legs for supersonic kicks and rapid rescues.

epic_cards.name: Ochaco Uraraka
epic_cards.description: The 'Zero Gravity Hero: Uravity', Ochaco manipulates gravity to make objects weightless for offense and mobility.

epic_cards.name: Shoto Todoroki
epic_cards.description: The 'Icy-Hot Hero: Shoto' Todoroki wields Quirk 'Half-Cold Half-Hot', freezing enemies with ice or burning them with fire for overwhelming offense.

legendary_cards.name: Izuku Midoriya
legendary_cards.description: The ninth wielder of One For All, Deku strives to become the greatest hero while mastering his inherited power.

legendary_cards.name: Katsuki Bakugo
legendary_cards.description: Bakugo uses nitro-glycerin like explosive sweat to unleash devastating blasts, aiming to surpass all heroes and rivals.

legendary_cards.name: Tomura Shigaraki
legendary_cards.description: Leader of the League of Villains, Shigaraki can disintegrate anything he touches, threatening hero society and life as we know it.

legendary_cards.name: All Might
legendary_cards.description: The former Symbol of Peace, All Might was the world's strongest hero and is mentor to Izuku Midoriya.
